original_text: It became great, even as great as the Prince of the host. And the regular burnt offering was taken away from him, and the place of his sanctuary was overthrown.
korean_text: 또 스스로 높아져서 군대의 주재를 대적하며 그에게 매일 드리는 제사를 없애 버렸고 그의 성소를 헐었으며

sentences.original_text: even as great as the Prince of the host
And the regular burnt offering was taken away from him
and the place of his sanctuary was overthrown
